contentVersion.description: A 4 number format for the version number of this template file. For example, 1.0.0.0

resources.description: Collection of resources to be deployed

dependsOn.description: Collection of resources this resource depends on

tags.description: Name-value pairs to add to the resource

apiVersion.description: API version of the resource type

dependsOn.description: Collection of resources this deployment depends on

contentVersion.description: If included it must match the contentVersion in the template

templateLink.description: Template file reference in a deployment

uri.description: URI referencing the deployment template parameters

contentVersion.description: If included it must match the contentVersion in the parameters file

parametersLink.description: Parameter file reference in a deployment

defaultValue.description: Default value to be used if one is not provided

allowedValues.description: Value can only be one of these values

expression.description: Deployment template expression.  Expressions are enclosed in [] and must start with a function of concat(), parameters(), variables(), reference(), resourceId(), resourceGroup(), subscription(), listKeys(), listPackage()
